00026 ReportSection* ReportManager::createReportSection(const string& name)
00027 {
00028     if (sections.find(name) == sections.end())
00029         sections[name] = new ReportSection();
00030     else
00031         Utils::get()->writeToLog("ReportSection with name [" + name + "] already exists, returning previously existing ReportSection.");
00032     return sections[name];
00033 }
00034 
00035 ReportSection* ReportManager::getReportSection(const string& name)
00036 {
00037     if (sections.find(name) == sections.end())
00038     {
00039         Utils::get()->writeToLog("ReportSection with name [" + name + "] does not exist, returning NULL.");
00040         return NULL;
00041     }
00042     else
00043         return sections[name];
00044 }
00045 
00046 void ReportManager::clearReportSections()
00047 {
00048     map<string, ReportSection*>::const_iterator iter;
00049     for (iter = sections.begin(); iter != sections.end(); ++iter)
00050         delete iter->second;
00051 
00052     sections.clear();
00053 }
00054 
00055 void ReportManager::writeReport(const bool& autoPurge)
00056 {
00057     ofstream report;
00058     string fileName = Utils::get()->formatString("../Reports/report %i.txt", reportCount++);
00059     report.open(fileName.c_str(), ios::trunc);
00060     report << "Predator Prey Simulator Report." << endl;
00061     report.close();
00062 
00063     report.open(fileName.c_str(), ios::app);
00064 
00065     map<string, ReportSection*>::reverse_iterator iter;
00066     for (iter = sections.rbegin(); iter != sections.rend(); ++iter)
00067     {
00068         const vector<string> messages = iter->second->getMessages();
00069 
00070         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < messages.size(); ++i)
00071             report << messages[i];
00072 
00073         report << endl;
00074     }
00075 
00076     report.close();
00077 
00078     if (autoPurge)
00079         clearReportSections();
00080 }
00081 
00082 ReportManager* ReportManager::get()
00083 {
00084     if (manager == NULL)
00085         manager = new ReportManager();
00086 
00087     return manager;
00088 }
